Betastream | Remote | Full-stack HTML5/JS/PHP or Ruby

Looking for a self-driven, reliable individual to work from home along with our team of remote devs. We have big clients and lots of work - this is a fulltime gig. We use Slack and Hangouts to communicate. A lot of our work is agency mandates.

Send previous works, code examples and resumes to pl@beta.io - no need to spend a week writing a cover letter, be straightforward.
